Juventus: the 5 eleven possible for Sarri




Who said Juventus Turin had picked up Adrien Rabiot for free? Free at the time of engagement with the Bianconeri, the Old Lady did not need to pay a single penny to Paris-Saint-Germain who too willing to play with fire finally burned. However, Juve still had to pay a sum to Rabiot clan as revealed today the JDD. Indeed, a commission of 1.4 million euros would have been negotiated by her mother at the time of her signature.




A significant saving




Adrien Rabiot and Maurizio Sarri + 6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

A large sum, but which ultimately does not represent much if it is related to the price of a possible transfer. Indeed, at the time of his departure from the PSG, the market value of the player was 35 million euros according to the site Transfermarkt. A substantial saving made by Juventus Turin that has made free players a real specialty. In her last seasons, the Old Lady has recovered Kingsley Coman, Andre Pirlo, Aaron Ramsey, Fernando Llorente, Dani Alves, Emre Can or Sami Khedira, all for zero euros. A strategy that is bearing fruit: the Turinese remain on 8 titles in Italy, even if the Champions League is still lacking.
